item.title: Can someone help me with ::home and ::bank commands? PLEASE

item.description:
@pawelwoj wrote:

i added
::bank
and ::home
commands and i wanna set them that u cannot use at wildy how will it look?
bank command is:

Code:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”))
{
openUpBank();
}
}and home command is:
Code:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”))
{
if (teleblock == true)
{
sM(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
toX = 3087;
toY = 3500;
sM(“You teleport to Home.”);
} could someone edit it ( add public boolean wildybank (home) = true; (or something like that)
Pawel
